system.description: Out of spells for the day and still have a horde of baddies breathing down your neck? Well, spend those Khaos Points in a different way! Your Khaos conduit is a makeshift weapon, expending that Radioactive hate in the form of kinetic energy. One Khaos Point deals [[/roll 1D4]]+Brains Mod+Level damage to any target within 30ft. Each Khaos Point after the 1st spent adds an additional [[/roll 1D4]] damage. Using a Khaos Point when under 6 ignores the Khaos Points Table. Still fires in the Spell Phase.
